name: @guscrawford.com/jyve-test
description: A test suite designed to abuse Jyv
author: Gus

scripts.postinstall: echo "✅  Replacing @jyv/core" && rm -rfv node_modules/@jyv && cd ../core && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../test && fpm add ../core
scripts.build:test: echo "⚙️  Building API Tests..." && cd src && tsc
scripts.test: echo "🔬  Running Unit Tests..." && yarn build:test && yarn mocha
scripts.test:coverage: echo "📊  Running Unit Tests and Coverage Report..." && yarn build:test && nyc mocha ./bin/test/src/start.test.js 1> .coverage
